ovdesc.p: This is a T24 Live table where the logs get captured for various interfaces running under DFE - Frame Work.

desc.p: Updates with the DFE Interface Code for the current DFE batch.
Example. ACCOUNT.EXTRACT
Updates with current company ID.
Example. GB0010001
Updates with current date.
Example. 18 Jan 2013
Updates with the current configured application name present in DFE.MAPPING > FILE.NAME.
Updates with the Transaction reference for particular record.
Updates with the Transaction success / failure status for each particular record.
This field will updated with request message for each record while inward processing.
This field will updated with response data processed for every data.
Also this will be captured for read / write errors.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
